You MUST be 13 years old or older to post anything on this site!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): You MUST be 13 years old or older to post anything on this site!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, May 26, 2000 - 05:57 pm:

New Federal regulations require that anyone under 13 submit parental consent forms BEFORE posting anything on the web. Please read the Privacy Policy for more information. Any posts from anyone underage who has not submitted a consent form will be deleted.

No one under 13 is allowed in the chatroom. Delphi keeps a log of all users, showing dates and times logged in.
